articles.title: New Vitamin D Strategy Cuts Second Heart Attack Risk in Half - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A new study reveals that a personalized, monitored approach to vitamin D3 supplementation after a heart attack can dramatically cut the risk of a second heart attack. A new study from heart specialists at Intermountain Health in Salt Lake City reports that a …
